casebody.data:
State ex rel. Staats
v.
Hartnett 2018-0580 Supreme Court of Ohio. July 11, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

In Mandamus. On respondents' motions to dismiss. Motions granted. Cause dismissed. Respondent Judge Chryssa N. Hartnett's motion to find relator a vexatious litigator denied. O'Donnell, Kennedy, French, and DeWine, JJ., concur. O'Connor, C.J., and Fischer and DeGenaro, JJ., concur in granting the motion to dismiss and would grant the motion to find relator a vexatious litigator.
